name: 2024 5th International Conference on Teaching and Education Management
content: Publication: 1\. All peer-reviewed papers (AI-related) accepted will be published on AIET 2024 conference proceedings as the special chapter, submitted into Conference Proceedings. Abstracting/Indexing: Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc. 2\. All peer-reviewed papers (not AI-related) accepted will be published into IJLT (International Journal of Learning and Teaching) Website: http://www.ijlt.org ISSN: 2377-2891(Print); 2377-2905(Online) Frequency: Quarterly Abstracting/Indexing: Google Scholar; Crossref, CNKI, etc.
